H0.text: Solar energy is the form of energy into which an electric motor is designed to convert electrical energy.

H1.text: Potential energy is what an electric motor is designed to turn electrical energy into.

H2.text: Static electricity is what an electric motor is designed to turn electrical energy into.

H3.text: Mechanical energy is the form into which an electric motor is designed to convert electrical energy.

A4.text: An electric motor is a machine that converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.
